data.text: @Baddiel Putin has no genocidial ambitions. This is pure lie.

@Nice_GuyEddie @neillancaster66 @robinince @Baddiel He isn't going to reply to you. They just stick their fingers in their ears if you show them anything that counters their narratives. 
There's none so blind as those who will not see.
@Baddiel Careful David, he'll be sending you begging tweets asking you to join him to have an honest and open debate.

@backeddyback @njbennett @Baddiel There’s plenty of evidence of abduction for example prints, DNA, open window and curtains, raised shutter, witnesses. Damage doesn’t have to be caused to effect a break in. Abductors rarely leave traces. @njbennett is a Conspiraloon, says the Queen is a cannibal.
@Baddiel Not much ‘nuance’ in bombing maternity hospitals
@IrvineWelsh @d_newsham @Baddiel In the same context ... politics as well
@d_newsham @will_deans @Baddiel It could be that acting actually is what he does best
